meanings.sent1: The old car was drossier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: This fabric feels drossier than the softer one.
meanings.sent3: The drossier paint job made the house look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her mood grew drossier as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The drossier taste of the burnt toast lingered in the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: Among the three cakes, the chocolate one was the drossiest.
meanings.sent2: The drossiest part of the movie was the predictable ending.
meanings.sent3: The drossiest outfit at the party was a mix of polka dots and stripes.
meanings.sent4: His drossiest fear was being alone in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The drossiest smell in the room was a mix of burnt popcorn and perfume.
